section.title: 申请人获取预约申请列表
section.sql: select * from Car_Applied where (AppliedStatue !='拒绝' and AppliedStatue!='取消' and AppliedStatue!='已完成' and AppliedStatue !='待处理' ) and CarAppliedAccount=@CarAppliedAccount

section.title: 司机获取预约申请列表
section.sql: select * from Car_Applied where (AppliedStatue !='拒绝' and AppliedStatue!='取消' and AppliedStatue!='已完成' and AppliedStatue !='待处理') and COAccount=@COAccount

section.title: 待处理记录
section.sql: select * from Car_Applied where AppliedStatue='待处理' order by ApplyDate desc

section.title: 待出车记录
section.sql: select * from Car_Applied where AppliedStatue='待出车' or AppliedStatue='开始' order by StartTime asc

section.title: 查找某车某日是否有记录
section.sql: select CarAppliedID from Car_Applied where (AppliedStatue!='拒绝' and AppliedStatue!='取消' ) and LicenseID=@LicenseID and starttime<=@starttime and endtime>=@starttime

section.title: 改变预约状态
section.sql: update Car_Applied set AppliedStatue=@AppliedStatue where CarAppliedID=@CarAppliedID

section.title: 延期返回
section.sql: update Car_Applied set Days=@Days,EndTime=@EndTime where CarAppliedID=@CarAppliedID

section.title: 查找延期冲突的记录
section.sql: select * from Car_Applied where (AppliedStatue='待处理' or AppliedStatue='待出车') and LicenseID=@LicenseID and StartTime<=@StartTime and EndTime >=@StartTime

section.title: 根据车牌查找所有对应的记录
section.sql: select * from Car_Applied where (AppliedStatue='待处理' or AppliedStatue='待出车') and LicenseID=@LicenseID order by ApplyDate asc

section.title: 结束行程，更改结束时间
section.sql: update Car_Applied set Days=@Days,EndTime=@EndTime where CarAppliedID=@CarAppliedID
